events.message: I recently purchased a blender from your website, but it stopped working within a week. I want to request a refund as this is unacceptable.
The customer has requested a refund due to a faulty product that stopped working within a week of purchase.
Assigning the refund request case to agent Mary to handle the refund process for the faulty blender.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us. I’m sorry to hear about the issue with your blender. Let me assist you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if you still have the original packaging and receipt for the purchase?
Sure, my order number is 458293. I have kept the packaging and receipt safely. Let me know what’s next.
Thank you for the details. We will begin the refund process immediately and send you a prepaid return shipping label to send the blender back.
That sounds great, thank you for handling this quickly. I will wait for the shipping label to return the blender.
We’ve received your returned blender and processed the refund. You should see the amount credited back to your payment method within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm you have received the refund and if there is anything else I can assist you with today.
Since your refund has been processed and confirmed, I am closing this case. Thank you for your patience and understanding.
